metadata.description: In this custom 1/1 Hoop Dream Studios original, artist Jarrett Ellis creates his first-ever fully hybrid piece as a feature for the One of None Hybrid Gallery during NFT.NYC 2022. With inspirations drawing from a range of personal experiences and his passion for the sport, this 1/1 piece plays into the concept of its additional dimensions through the use of the infinity backboard.
metadata.name: Black Infinity Mirror Hoop
